## US - DPRK Summit
```{r}
library(leaflet)

df <- data.frame(
  name = c("Capella Hotel Singapore", "Shangri-La Hotel Singapore", "The St. Regis Singapore"),
  lon = c(103.824440, 103.826734, 103.826031),
  lat = c(1.249712, 1.311547, 1.305854),
  type = factor(c("meet", "hotel", "hotel"))
)

myIcons <- iconList(
  meet = makeIcon(iconUrl = "https://www.openstreetmap.org/assets/osm_logo-f13314123f336d32682fddc79f2a5f0dedc894c637decede98a41587340dad19.svg", 32, 32),
  hotel = makeIcon(iconUrl = "https://duckduckgo.com/assets/logo_homepage.normal.v107.svg", 32, 32)
)

map <-leaflet(data = df) %>% addTiles()

addMarkers(map, ~lon, ~lat, icon = ~myIcons[type], popup = ~name)
```
